name: Cure The Cow!
description:
Your only companion on the island, Cow, is sick! Explore your island home, gather ingredients, figure out the recipe and Cure The Cow!

Controls:
WASD/Arrow keys to move
E to interact and Q to close menus
Escape to pause

Hints:
For the recipe section, 

  • Red: Ingredient is not present in recipe
  • Yellow: Ingredient is in the wrong box
  • Green: Ingredient is in the right box

Credits:
Game assets from:
Sprout Lands by CupNooble (https://cupnooble.itch.io/sprout-lands-asset-pack)

Music from:
Dreaming Under The Stars by Darren-Curtis

Game made for My First Game Jam Summer 2022.
